alert.note: Alert for Eastern Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 27 at 3:32AM EST until February 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...In New York, Northern Herkimer County. In Vermont, Eastern Windham County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heaviest between 9 pm this evening and 5 am Tuesday, where snowfall rates of around 0.5 inch per hour are expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
